hero.title: Next Generation Bitcoin Mining Protocol
hero.subtitle: Enhanced security, reduced latency, and decentralized mining infrastructure

texts.efficient: improves how miners, pools, and the Bitcoin network communicate. It secures mining with end-to-end encryption and makes it more efficient by reducing bandwidth and latency.
texts.decentralized: Most importantly, Stratum V2 empowers miners to choose which transactions are included in blocks, protecting Bitcoin's fundamental properties - decentralization and censorship resistance.
texts.profitable: Stratum V2 increases miner profits by minimizing stale shares, reducing block and job latency, improving propagation speed, and cutting bandwidth waste. These upgrades directly improve efficiency turning savings into more revenue.

hero.title: Upgrade Your Mining Operation
hero.subtitle: Maximize your Bitcoin mining profitability with enhanced security, reduced operational costs, and complete autonomy.

profitability.title: Measurable Profitability Gains
profitability.gain: Boost your net profit by up to 7.4%.
profitability.noUpgrade: Immediate benefits—no mandatory firmware upgrades required.

feeCapture.title: Optimized Fee Revenue
feeCapture.moreFees: Capture up to 1.06% more fees per block.
feeCapture.fresherJobs: Real-time job updates maximize fee inclusion.

adoption.title: Simple and Low-Risk Adoption
adoption.translator: Translation Proxy supports SV1 firmware devices.

templateControl.title: Complete Block Template Control
templateControl.construction: Miner-side block template construction for full autonomy.

security.title: Advanced Security Protection
security.profitProtection: Secure up to 5% of your net profit by protecting your hashrate.

hero.title: Future-Proof Your Mining Pool
hero.subtitle: Stratum V2 is the modern mining protocol standard designed to address the limitations of Stratum V1. It was developed by Braiins and Matt Corallo and has been maintained by an independent, open-source community and contributors across the industry for over 4 years.

efficiency.title: Efficiency Improvements
efficiency.description: Binary message format with less bandwidth and lower latency, enhancing operational efficiency and profitability.

security.title: Security Improvements
security.description: End-to-end encryption and authentication to secure mining operations.

decentralizedTemplate.title: Decentralized Block Template Construction
decentralizedTemplate.description: Miners build their own block templates, enhancing autonomy, decentralization, and innovation.

payoutMechanism.title: Supports Any Payout Mechanism
payoutMechanism.description: Compatible with FPPS, PPLNS, and other popular payout systems.

backwardsCompatible.title: Backwards Compatible
backwardsCompatible.description: Interoperable with Stratum V1 firmware devices.

profitabilityCaseStudy.title: Proven Profitability
profitabilityCaseStudy.description: Recent case-study demonstrates profit increases up to 7.4% and significant improvements in security, efficiency, and decentralization.

modular.title: Modular Protocol
modular.description: Natively supports GCC, merged mining, custom payout schemes, and future protocol upgrades.

wellSpecified.title: Well-specified Protocol
wellSpecified.description: Fully documented and actively maintained by the working group.

gccMergedMining.title: GCC and Merged Mining
gccMergedMining.description: Supports merged mining use cases, adapting to evolving industry requirements.

innovationBlocks.title: Foundation for Innovation
innovationBlocks.description: Enables the creation of mining farm software and optimized firmware.

developerFriendly.title: Developer Friendly
developerFriendly.description: Modular and open-source infrastructure allows quick customization and deployment.

futureBuilt.title: Built for the Future
futureBuilt.description: Aligns with latest standards, offering advanced features competitors can't match.

miningCentralization.title: Mining Power Distribution
miningCentralization.subtitle: Currently, just 5 mining pools control over 83% of Bitcoin's total hashrate

security.title: Enhanced Security
security.subtitle: Stratum V2 encrypts all communication, protecting your credentials and mining data from attacks

latency.title: Faster & Lighter
latency.subtitle: Binary protocol reduces bandwidth usage by 75% and slashes latency from hundreds to just a few milliseconds

securityComparison.title: Enhanced Security
securityComparison.subtitle: Legacy mining protocols transmit data in plaintext, exposing miners to man-in-the-middle attacks and hashrate hijacking. Stratum V2 uses end-to-end encryption by default, protecting miners from theft and securing their profits.
securityComparison.plaintextDescription: Plaintext - vulnerable to interception & hashrate stealing
securityComparison.encryptedDescription: End-to-end encryption protects sensitive data & profit

blockPropagation.title: Faster Block Change & Propagation
blockPropagation.description: Improves profitability by increasing the likelihood that a miner's block is accepted first, especially during chain-split races. SV1 miners lose approximately 308.37 milliseconds per block due to block change latency. Over a year, this adds up to about 4.5 hours of completely unproductive mining time.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: All code is open source and available on GitHub. Contribute to the protocol's development and help shape the future of Bitcoin mining.

communityDriven.title: Community Driven
communityDriven.description: Decisions are made collectively by the community. No single entity controls the direction of the protocol.

joinOurCommunity.title: Join Our Community
joinOurCommunity.description: Connect with developers, miners, and pool operators. Get support, share ideas, and stay updated on the latest developments.

learn.heading: Learn
learn.title: LEARN SV2
learn.description: This resource page is designed to provide users with access to various media related to Stratum V2. The goal is to support users in their use and promotion of Stratum V2 by offering a hub for all necessary materials and information.

transactionControl.title: Control Your Revenue
transactionControl.subtitle: Take charge of your mining operation. Don't let pools decide which transactions make it into blocks or trust them to share all fee revenue.

currentReality.title: Current Reality
currentReality.description: Pools control transaction selection, potentially hiding high-fee transactions and making out-of-band deals

withStratumV2.title: With Stratum V2
withStratumV2.description: Select your transactions, maximize your revenue, and maintain full control

translationProxy.title: Firmware upgrade not necessary
translationProxy.description: Connect your SV1 firmware devices through Translation Proxy which facilitates the conversion of SV1 messages to SV2 for communication with an SV2 pool.

sponsorship.joinEffort: Join the collective effort and help us accelerate Bitcoin mining!

miningCentralization.title: The Centralization Crisis in Bitcoin Mining

problemStatement.firstParagraph: A few mining pools now dominate Bitcoin's block space, with some smaller pools
problemStatement.firstParagraphContinued: as their proxies. Pools have the ability to selectively include or exclude transactions, creating the risk of a permissioned system where some transactions could be blacklisted, undermining Bitcoin's core properties.
problemStatement.secondParagraph: Proprietary mining software and hardware vendor lock-ins further worsen the issue, stifling innovation and trapping miners within closed, centralized ecosystems.

minersSelect.title: Miners Select Transaction
minersSelect.description: Stratum V2 empowers miners to choose which transactions to include, shifting them from passive hashers to active participants in securing the network.

modular.title: Modular & Developer-Friendly
modular.description: Stratum V2 offers a free, open-source, modular infrastructure with permissive license, empowering developers to build and innovate.

interoperable.title: Interoperable & Neutral
interoperable.description: Community-driven governance and clear specifications ensure interoperability, preventing vendor lock-ins and fragmentation.

performance.title: Faster & Lighter
performance.description: Stratum V2 replaces the verbose JSON messages used by Stratum V1 with a compact binary protocol, leading to ~70% reductions in bandwidth usage.

poolSelector.title: Choose a Mining Pool
poolSelector.subtitle: Select a Stratum V2 Compatible Pool to start mining

dmnd.name: DMND Pool
dmnd.description: Professional mining pool with Stratum V2 support

braiins.name: Braiins Pool
braiins.description: Leading Bitcoin mining pool with advanced features

latencyJobBlockComparison.title: Latency Comparison: Block vs Job Latency

performanceMetrics.title: Performance Improvements
performanceMetrics.subtitle: Quantifiable improvements in key performance metrics

protocolComparison.title: Protocol Comparison
protocolComparison.subtitle: See how Stratum V2 improves upon the original protocol across key metrics

enhancedSecurity.title: Enhanced Security
enhancedSecurity.description: End-to-end encryption prevents man-in-the-middle attacks and hashrate hijacking

betterPerformance.title: Better Performance
betterPerformance.description: 75% reduction in bandwidth usage and 4x faster transaction processing

decentralization.title: Decentralization
decentralization.description: Miners gain more control over block templates and transaction selection

decentralizationBenefits.title: Decentralization Benefits
decentralizationBenefits.subtitle: How Stratum V2 empowers miners and improves network decentralization

transactionSelection.title: Transaction Selection
transactionSelection.description: Miners can now choose which transactions to include in blocks, reducing pool operator control

independentOperation.title: Independent Operation
independentOperation.description: Reduced infrastructure requirements make it easier for smaller miners to operate independently

feeOptimization.title: Fee Optimization
feeOptimization.description: Better control over transaction selection allows miners to optimize for higher fees
